cause.description:
The high school music program at KRHS includes the following groups: Wind Symphony Concert Band Jazz Band Marching Band Silver Winds Ebony Winds Brass Ensemble Saxophone Quartet Percussion Ensemble Pit Orchestra Concert Choir Chamber Choir Madrigals and even more!
The junior high music program includes: 7th Grade Band 8th Grade Band Junior High Jazz Band 7th Grade Chorus 8th Grade Chorus Select Choir and others as well!
Please help support these groups!
1. Music is a universal way of expression.
2. Each and every individual has the right to music.
3. Music is a vital part of an individual's education and development.
cause.mission: Advance the opportunities of music education and performance at KRHS.
cause.name: Kittatinny Music Program
